rows.label: bf02090100_0020
rows.name:
Right then. We should probably
try and find a town or something.

rows.label: bf02090100_0030
rows.name: Does anyone have any idea where we are?

rows.label: bf02090100_0040
rows.name:
This is Gula.
A province of the Superbian Empire.

rows.label: bf02090100_0050
rows.name: You must've seen the Gula Divine Beast before?

rows.label: bf02090100_0060
rows.name: Yeah, only from a distance, though.

rows.label: bf02090100_0090
rows.name:
Hang on a second, Nia - your ears.
Are you Gulan?

rows.label: bf02090100_0100
rows.name: What took you so long to figure it out?

rows.label: bf02090100_0110
rows.name: Gula is the land of my lady's birth.

rows.label: bf02090100_0130
rows.name:
If we wanna find a town, the first
step is to get out of this forest.

rows.label: bf02090100_0140
rows.name:
Keep heading up and we'll hit the
plains soon. The town's that way.
